original: exists (fun n => nth n l x). apply map_ext_in_iff. split. - intros. apply nth_error_In. rewrite nth_error_map. exists (nth a l x). reflexivity. - intros. destruct (nth_error l a) eqn:Hnth. ++ apply nth_error_In with (l:=l). rewrite Hnth. reflexivity. ++ exfalso. rewrite nth_error_None in Hnth. apply (proj2 H) in Hnth. contradiction.
